column4: Okay so I started my Ubuntu (actually Edubuntu, although I uninstalled the edubuntu features) computer this morning to a lovely error message, something to the tune of an automatic fsck failed so i have to do it manually and then reboot.
I have seen this once before too; what is it? what's the problem?
sounds like a hard drive problem.
can be accessed easily through a browser, which is just cool.
